Description.0:
## Job Description

Role: Senior Data Engineer

Location: Toronto, ON

Duration: 06 Months with potential to extend.

The Senior Data Engineer is part of a Corporate Analytics team responsible for
supporting data and analytics solutions for MMC Corporate Functions. This
individual will collaborate with analytics team to design and implement MMC
corporate data strategy, ensuring reliable data infrastructure and creating
data solutions for variety of business use cases.

**  
What you need to have:**

  * 7+ years of experience in tier 1 or 2 IT services companies or Tier 1 captives
  * 7 years of experience implementing analytics data Solutions leveraging Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Logic Apps, ML Studio, Datalake and Synapse
  * Working experience with Scala, Python or R
  * Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related disciplines.

 ****

**What can you expect?**

  * Drive innovation within Data Engineering by playing a key role in technology decisions for the future of our data science and analytics
  * Critical team member in the design and development for highly complex and critical data projects
  * Leverage research and previous experience to ensure we’re up-to-date and continuously exploring
  * We are passionate about trying new things and we follow through with 10% time and Tech hack-a-thons
  * Excellent Professional development and Career growth opportunities
  * We will count on you to:
  * Create and maintain highly scalable data pipelines across Azure Data Lake Storage, and Azure Synapse using Data Factory, Databricks and Apache Spark/Scala
  * Responsible for managing a growing cloud-based data ecosystem and reliability of our Corporate datalake and analytics data mart
  * Contribute to the continued evolution of Corporate Analytics Platform and Integrated data model.
  * Identify gaps and weaknesses in our data stack and continue to guide learning advancements for the team
  * Provide technical expertise and leadership to Data Engineering team in all phases of work including analysis, design and architecture to develop and implement cutting-edge solutions.
  * Negotiate and influence changes outside of the team that continuously shape and improve the Data strategy

 ****

**What makes you stand out?**

  * Excellent communication and presentation skills
  * Domain knowledge in one of more of Corporate functions such as HR, Finance, Real Estate is preferred
  * Excellent Problem solving skills with innovative and proactive approach
  * Ability to recommend and implement best practices and processes
Description.1:
## Job Description

Our client is looking to hire a motivated and talented Senior iOS Mobile
Engineer on their team, you will have an opportunity to work on the latest
technology and platforms available. You will help create the architecture and
model that support features to educate our millions of clients all over the
world. You will work alongside the backend and data science teams to deliver
large scale technology stacks.  
  
Your responsibilities:  
  
• work with our engineers, designers, and product managers to push the limits
of the mobile experience  
  
• Analyze trade-offs across options for app technology and architecture.
Influence and lead roadmap towards the right choices for our client  
  
• Drive high-quality iOS app releases and help define metrics to keep
regressions in check  
  
• Implement coding methods and ensure the apps are well processed while
mentioning a junior team.  
  
Preferred Qualifications:  
  
• Comfortable working in a fast-paced team environment.  
  
• Ability to build productive mobile apps with a significant backend component
for app store distribution  
  
• Strong communication, presentation, and technical skills.  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the
hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation
policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.

Description.3:
## Job Description

Job Description  
  
**Senior Android Developer**  
  
**Job Description**

  * Our client is seeking a Senior Android developer to work as part of our mobile development team with a focus on our mobile investing platforms. 
  * As part of the team, you will innovate, design, and deliver solutions for a variety of projects related to our mobile investing platform to deliver legendary mobile experiences for our customers. 
  * You will have experience in developing native Android solutions within an agile development model with a focus on seamless delivery, innovation, and stability of the mobile platforms. 
  * This is an opportunity to be part of an innovative dynamic development team with a direct impact on customer experience in the mobile investing space. 

  
**Responsibilities include:**

  * Team first attitude, embracing and contributing to a diverse team of experts dedicated to moving the mobile investing space forward for the client 
  * Effective communicator able to work closely with technical experts, project teams, business, and outside vendors in a collaborative 'pod' structure 
  * Interpret the System Requirements Specification (SRS) and System Design Specification [SDS] and develop solutions to initiatives that are in line with the intended design and standards 
  * Adhere to guidelines/procedures on highly complex or large-scale projects complying with the system development life cycle (SDLC) and project management methodology (PMLC) as related to agile development practices. 
  * The Senior Android developer participates in code reviews to ensure quality, standards compliance, reusability, and ease of maintenance 
  * Deliver effective and efficient solutions by meeting key project milestones and ensure that the project deliverables are on time, within budget, and adhere to the corporate quality and security standards 
  * Communicate status and provide timely escalation of issues to ensure project objectives are met 
  * Continuously enhance knowledge/expertise in both the mobile development and investing spaces and keep current with leading-edge technologies trends/developments. 
  * Ability to innovate, share business value of proposed concepts via self-initiated rapid proof of concepts 
  * Provide technical support for escalated incidents/outages to ensure that they are resolved efficiently with minimal impact on stakeholders 
  * The Senior Android developer provide input into the Application Deployment Plans and overall mobile app roll-out strategy 
  * Support a positive work environment that promotes service to the business, quality, innovation, and teamwork and ensures timely communication of issues/ points of interest 
  * Identify and recommend opportunities to enhance productivity, effectiveness, and operational efficiency of the business unit and/or team 
  * Participate in knowledge transfer within the team and business units 
  * Work on a broad range of tasks and multiple, concurrent projects. 
  * Prioritize and manage own workload in order to deliver quality results and meet timelines 

  
**Department Overview**

  * Building a World-Class, Diverse and Inclusive Technology Team We can't afford to be boring. Neither can you. 
  * The scale and scope of what the client does may surprise you. 
  * The rapid pace of change makes it a business imperative for us to be smart and open-minded in the way we think about technology. 
  * Client technology and business teams become more intertwined as new opportunities present themselves. This new era in banking does not equal boring. Not at the client, anyway. 
  * Client Applications & Systems Development covers technical planning, integration, systems analysis, design, development, unit and component systems testing, support maintenance, and more. 
  * Meaningful, effective relationship-building is part of what these highly-skilled experts do best as they work together with technology project managers, delivery partners, business and systems analysts, testing and quality assurance teams, sponsors and so many other stakeholders to clarify requirements. 

  
**Must-Have:**

  * Mobile Development experience 
  * Android app building experience 
  * Agile experience 
  * Kotlin experience 
  * Understanding of IT Standards, UX Design, Accessibility 
  * Comfortable with collective code ownership and pair programming 

  
**Nice to have:**

  * Wealth experience 
  * Knowledge of CI/CD tools and scripts 

  
**Education/ Experience:**

  * Degree/Certifications Required: Undergrad degree 
  * Years of experience: 5+ years 

  
**About the Company**  
As a top 10 North American bank, our client aims to stand out from its peers
by having a differentiated brand - anchored in a proven business model and
rooted in a desire to give its customers, communities, and colleagues the
confidence to thrive in a changing world.  
  
Our client engages in providing financial products and services. They offer
various financial products and services, as well as telephone, Internet, and
mobile banking services, retail and commercial banking services, as well as
wealth management services. The Wholesale Banking segment provides capital
markets, investment banking, corporate banking products, and investment needs
to companies, governments, and institutions in financial markets.  
  
#tech  
#LI-GW1  
#LI-Remote
Description.5:
## Job Description

**Overview: **

TekWissen Group is a workforce management provider throughout the USA and many
other countries in the world. Our client is a company who is a provider of
banking and financial services. The company operates through two divisions,
Retail Banking and Services, and Corporate and Institutional Banking.

**SUMMARY OF THE ROLE**

**MISSION AND OBJECTIVES**

  * The APS Analyst (“Analyst”) is responsible and accountable for the daily support and health of the production environment for Regulatory Controls IT. 

  * Such tasks include change, request, incident, and problem management for the department. 

  * As required, functional support and user setup may be performed. The Analyst shall serve on a team that acts as the first point-of-contact (Level 1 and 2): the role will be to receive, record, and understand issues, fix known issues, suggest improvements, route unknown issues to Level 3 support staff, and to then communicate the resolution to the requestor. 

  * Assist the user community to resolve technical issues. Coverage during weekends and off-hours is on an "as needed" basis. 

**MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES**

  * Manage daily operations requests for assistance and oversee the help desk activity 

  * Ensure issues are identified, tracked, reported on, and resolved in a timely manner 

  * Manage operations expectations effectively and participate in any task force required by operations if needed 

  * Perform level 1 and 2 support and complex analysis of reported issues, and evaluate alternative business solutions and workarounds to minimize the impacts 

  * Prepare Test Strategy, Test scenarios, and test cases for the defects identified 

  * Liaison and discussion with Client central teams for all parameterization related issues and any other functional advice on reported issues or proposed solutions 

  * Work with external infrastructure, monitoring, and DBA team to fix the incidents. 

  * Ensure a smooth follow-up of all technical processes (Online, STP, and batches…) 

  * Understand the database concepts and provide extractions to users whenever required 

  * Participate in the night support of the application and undertake the appropriate actions – both functional and technical 

  * Closely follow up on all generated logs (Online, STP, batches) and alerts and monitor the flows dashboards 

  * Ensures presence, monitoring, and checks during application rollouts and DR exercises. 

  * Ensure excellent communication, reporting, and escalation as and when needed. 

**IT Governance**

  * Responsible and accountable for strictly and consistently adhering to BP2S NAR IT Governance policies and procedures – Incident management, Vendor management, and change management 

**QUALIFICATIONS**

  * Bachelor’s degree is required; an advanced degree is considered a plus. 

  * Minimum 6 years of financial industry experience with an emphasis on Custody activity 

  * Prior business analysis experience in an application support environment 

  * Experience with PL/SQL developer 

  * Familiarity with Autosys, Quality Center, SailPoint, ServiceNow, and Jira. 

  * Experience in the Custodian Industry is a must. 

  * Prior experience working on Bank applications is a strong plus. 

  * Prior experience creating requirements documents, functional specifications, process flow diagrams, and procedures 

  * Strong knowledge of asset setup, corporate actions, tax, domestic settlements, and income or cash processing is a must in the custody domain (at least 2 of these). 

  * Good written and spoken English is a must. 

  * Strong Corporate Actions/Tax knowledge in US Market is a major plus 

  * Overall General IT knowledge is a must 

**Tek Wissen® Group is an equal opportunity/affirmative action Employer
(m/f/d/v) supporting workforce diversity.**
Description.7:
## Job Description

**Who we are**

BairesDev is proud to be the fastest-growing company in America. With people
in five continents and world-class clients, we are only as strong as the
multicultural teams at the heart of our business. To consistently deliver the
highest quality solutions to our clients, we only hire the Top 1% of the best
talents and nurture their professional growth on exciting projects.

Sales Coordinator at BairesDev

We are looking for a Sales Coordinator to join our Sales Team and help
spearhead our growth.

As a Sales Coordinator, you will play a critical and active role in the day-
to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key
members of our Sales team and position yourself for unique career growth
opportunities.

**What You'll Do:**

  * Conduct in-depth research on prospects.
  * Using proprietary Sales Tools to contact and convert leads into clients.
  * Contacting potential clients via email to establish rapport and set up meetings.
  * Reach out by phone and hold quality conversations to generate qualified prospects.
  * Work closely and collaboratively to develop and implement appropriate prospect strategies and plans.
  * Work internally with the Sales Management and Marketing teams to ensure proper quality and quantity of presentations.
  * Provide complete and appropriate solutions to boost revenue growth and profitability.
  * Present, promote, and sell services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers.
  * Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.

**Here s what we are looking for:**

  * Proven work experience as a Sales Representative.
  * Must be highly motivated, flexible, and service-oriented.
  * Must be familiar with CRM practices, along with the ability to build productive business professional relationships.
  * Goal-oriented, driven, and experienced in networking with and influencing decision-makers.
  * Excellent selling, communication, and negotiation skills.
  * Prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills.
  * Thorough understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques.
  * Experience in opening doors to new opportunities.
  * Fast learner and passionate about sales.
  * A network of potential clients in the IT industry or other verticals is a big plus.
  * Advanced English level.

**How we do make your work (and your life) easier:**

  * 100% remote work.
  * Hardware setup for you to work from home.
  * Flexible hours make your schedule.
  * Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.
  * Diverse and multicultural work environment.
  * An innovative environment with the structure and resources of a leading multinational.
  * Excellent compensation well above the market average.
  * Here you can grow at the speed of your learning curve.

Our people work remotely but with a consistent and robust culture that
promotes diversity and teamwork. To continue being the leading software
development company in Latin America, we want to ensure that every BairesDev
member gets the best growth and professional development opportunities in a
diverse, welcoming, and innovative environment.

Every BairesDev team member brings something unique to our company.

We want to hear your story. Apply now!

Check our website.

Description.9:
## Job Description

![](https://counter.adcourier.com/aS5oZWF0bGV5LjQxMjQ3LjQwNzNAbmlnZWxmcmFuay5hcGxpdHJhay5jb20.gif)  
  

**D365 CE Senior Technical Consultant - Client Care Team**

  

I am working with a Microsoft Gold Partner building out their D365 CE team and
are looking to hire a CRM Technical Consultant. While working in this role you
will provide senior-level technical support by troubleshooting and resolving
issues for all aspects of this clients customer's CE implementations.

  

This is a fully remote opportunity with no travel and willing to hire from any
time zone but would like someone preferably in Canada. This role requires a
candidate with partner experience and proven ability to work with a virtual
team.

  

 **The ideal candidate for this position has:**

  

  

  * 3 or more years of experience in CE implementation and support
  

  * 6 or more years of consultation experience
  

  * Experience with Power Platform (Power Automate, Portals, Power BI), Azure Data Factory
  

  * High technical knowledge of D365 CE sales, marketing and Field Service
  

  

 **This position is offering an incredible benefits package, including but not
limited to:**

  

  

  * Excellent paid time off
  

  * Health, dental & vision insurance
  

  * 401K
  

  * Competitive base salary
  

  * Fully Remote
  

  

To apply please send resumes to Isaac Heatley at or call . Interviews
happening daily!

  

Nigel Frank International is the global leader for Microsoft Dynamics
recruitment, advertising more Dynamics CRM jobs than any other agency. We deal
with both Microsoft Partners & End Users throughout North America. By
specializing solely in placing candidates in the Microsoft Dynamics market I
have built relationships with most of the key employers in North America and
have an unrivalled understanding of where the best opportunities and Dynamics
CRM jobs are.

  

I understand the need for discretion and would welcome the opportunity to
speak to any Microsoft Dynamics CRM candidates that are considering a new
career or job either now or in the future. Confidentiality is of course
guaranteed. For information on the Microsoft Dynamics market and some of the
opportunities and Dynamics CRM jobs that are available I can be contacted on .
Please see [www.nigelfrank.com](http://www.aplitrak.com/www.nigelfrank.com)
for more fantastic Microsoft Dynamics opportunities!

  

Nigel Frank International Inc. is acting as an Employment Agency in relation
to this vacancy.
Description.10:
## Job Description

A SAAS company building a remote-friendly Cloud Engineering department (with
offices in Ottawa and Toronto for those who would like the option of hybrid
work) is looking for DevOps Engineers that desire to be in on the ground floor
of building out an Automation Platform. The ideal candidate will bring both
Azure and DevOps skills to bear on a product that helps supply network
logistics across the world.  
  
**Required Skills & Experience**  

  * 2+ years Experience scaling and managing Azure Cloud environments
  * Advanced CI/CD tooling (ArgoCD, Jenkins)
  * Production Terraform projects

  
**Desired Skills & Experience**  

  * Any Python experience (design) a major asset
  * Extensive previous projects using GIt

What You Will Be Doing  
Tech Breakdown  

  * 65% Cloud Environment (Azure)
  * 35% Hybrid Server Environment (most Windows)

  
Daily Responsibilities  

  * 65% Hands On
  * 35% Team Collaboration

The Offer

  * Bonus Eligible

  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future.  
  
Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the hiring process as required
under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation policy. Applicants need to
make their needs known in advance.  
  
#LI-AC1

Description.12:
## Job Description

Job Description  
  
**Risk Analyst**  
  
**Job Description**

  * The U.S. Non-Retail Model Development group is hiring a 12-month contractor to support stress testing and allowance modeling activities for the U.S. Non-retail portfolio. 

  
**Job Responsibilities:**

  * The Risk Analyst will develop the Current Expected Credit Losses (CECL) methodology for the U.S. Non-Retail portfolio. 
  * The report visualizes and presents data to provide actionable insights to management as well as monitor business performance and develop stronger strategies. 
  * Conduct applied research and leverage internal and external data to benchmark new methodologies. 
  * Collaborate with other teams and participate in cross-functional projects as needed. 
  * The Risk Analyst will perform ad-hoc analyses as required by management and other business partners. 
  * Produce and maintain well-articulated documentation on the above functions. 
  * Write and maintain efficient and robust code while performing the above functions. 

  
**Must-Have Skills**

  * Programming experience is mandatory, preferably SAS and Python. 
  * Strong interest and ability to undertake applied research and write technical reports. 
  * Out-of-the-box thinker and enthusiastic about solving problems. 
  * Strong written and verbal communication skills. 
  * Ability to work in a multi-disciplinary team setting. 
  * Strong work ethic and adaptability to changing priorities. 

  
**Nice To Have**

  * A graduate degree in a quantitative field, such as Econometrics, Quantitative Economics, and Statistics is required. PhDs are preferred. 
  * Experience in the credit modeling space is preferred. 
  * A strong theoretical and numerical background is an asset. 

  
**Notes:**

  * Our client is looking for a Risk Analyst with a risk management or economics background 

  
**About the Company** :

  * As a top 10 North American bank, our client aims to stand out from its peers by having a differentiated brand - anchored in a proven business model and rooted in a desire to give its customers, communities, and colleagues the confidence to thrive in a changing world. 
  * Our client engages in providing financial products and services. They offer various financial products and services, as well as telephone, Internet, and mobile banking services, retail and commercial banking services, as well as wealth management services. The Wholesale Banking segment provides capital markets, investment banking, corporate banking products, and investment needs to companies, governments, and institutions in financial markets. 

#tech  
#LI-Remote  
#LI-GW1

## Job Description

Job Description  
  
Would you like to be apart of an award-winning mobile app development company?
Designed and developed best-in-class mobile solutions for a plethora of
popular companies we interact with daily. A growing team looking for
passionate and like-minded people to contribute to their mission to drive
mobile transformation and innovation into the future.  
  
Required Skills and Experience  

  * Minimum 4 years' experience in Android SDK development, Mobile development with Java and Kotlin.
  * Experience with Android front-end development
  * Databinding
  * Data Modelling
  * MVC and MVVM architectures.
  * Experience with Java or Kotlin

  
Desired Skills and Experience  

  * A University or College degree in Computer Science or equivalent
  * Exposure to mobile architecture concepts
  * Experience with Android/Fire TV or Live/video streaming applications

  
What you will be doing  

  * 70% Hands on.
  * 30% Management.

  
Benefits  

  * 160k
  * 8-10% Bonus
  * 6% RRSP Matching
  * 3 weeks vacation

  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the
hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation
policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.
Description.15:
## Job Description

Looking to work on high-scale Infrastructure innovation projects that will
make an international impact?  
  
In the case of this Canadian Technology/Experiecne org (that was recieved
numerous awards for customer experience), the timing is right for a Senior
Site Reliability Engineer to join a Cloud team that prides itself on solving
high-level enginering problems and dictating the technical direction across
the entire company.  
  
This environment will appeal to the Engineer that prefers to work on quick-
moving Agile teams, where a good idea will be immediately listened to, and (if
proven) quickly implemented. In terms of responsibilities, this Engineer will
partner with numerous product teams, customizing solutions while continuously
operating as an expert in all things Kubernetes. This position can be worked
100% Remote indefinitely.  
  
**Required Skills & Experience**  

  * 4+ Years working extensively with Cloud-based infrastructure (environment is built on Google Cloud Platform)
  * Proven history of excelling in production Containerized environments (ECS, Docker, Kubernetes)
  * Jenkins or Circle-CI hands-on prowess
  * Experience introducing and establishing Infrastructure-As-Code best practices

  
**Desired Skills & Experience**  

  * Proven history of excelling as first/early DevOps Engineer in Start-Up environment
  * Bachelor's or Master's Degree
  * Experience overhauling Monitoring systems

  
**What You Will Be Doing**  
  
Job Breakdown  

  * 70% Hands On
  * 35% Team Collaboration

  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future.  
  
Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the hiring process as required
under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation policy. Applicants need to
make their needs known in advance.  
  
#LI-AC1
Description.16:
## Job Description

**Senior iOS Engineer**  
  
Job Description  
  
My client is relied upon by governments and trusted agencies across the world.
They build security technology that makes it possible for millions of
individuals, and government agencies to secure data. With offices in around
the world, they're eager to take on new employees to grow and strengthen their
team today!  
  
Required Skills and Experience  

  * At least 5 years building & shipping commercial mobile software for the iOS platform,
  * Proficiency with Swift and a deep knowledge/usage of the iOS SDK.
  * Working knowledge of Objective C and the XCode tool set.
  * Proficient in Object Oriented Programming, Data Modeling and Design Patterns.
  * Proven track record of developing highly scalable designs.
  * Demonstrated track record of developing clean and maintainable code.
  * Ability to break complex problems down into smaller components that are loosely coupled and testable
  * Discipline for testing and automation - unit, functional, integration, etc.
  * Stellar communication skills; able to work well with a smart, passionate and growing team
  * Preference for working in a dynamic startup environment where everyday offers new challenges
  * BS in Computer Science or related field

  
Desired Skills and Experience  

  * Understanding of networking terminology & protocols.
  * Experience with Security.
  * Experience developing on Android platforms
  * Personal apps available on Appstore.

  
What you will be doing  

  * Build an incredible iOS product suite, including designing, estimating, and delivering high quality solutions that secure hundreds of millions of users.
  * Champion the great mobile architecture and good software design paradigms.
  * Work closely with product management & design teams to take an idea from concept to delivery using excellent software design, coding, & processes.

  
  
Benefits  

  * 170k
  * 4 weeks vacation
  * Competitive benefits

  
  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis
now and in the future. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the
hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment's Employment Accommodation
policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.

For our client in Canada we are looking for Welders

You should be able to do the below:

Read drawings and take measurements to plan procedures, determine the
appropriate welding equipment or method based on requirements, set up
components for welding according to specifications, Repair machinery and other
components by welding pieces and filling gaps, inspect welded surfaces to
discover flaws, Maintain equipment in safe condition.

Description.18:
## Job Description

Job Description  
A cutting-edge digital learning platform here in Toronto is hiring a Principal
PHP Developer. This is a 100% remote position open to anyone living in EST;
they were remote prior to Covid19 and will remain so well after. This is a
full-time position. The platform is built with Laravel and AWS.  
  
They are working to modernize how post-secondary institutions engage with
their students and staff. One driving force behind their platform is the
belief that education and knowledge should be available to everyone - not just
those who live in certain areas. With a laundry list of new features (many
integrating AI into existing and new logics) developers can expect to be
challenged and engaged in their work.  
Required Skills & Experience

  * Ideally 4 years of professional PHP utilizing Laravel
  * 6+ years of development experience
  * Prior work leading the technical side of a project
  * Production experience with AWS preferred; all Cloud experience is accepted
  * Bachelor's Degree in computer science or equivalent

Desired Skills & Experience

  * Prior experience working on small teams
  * Proven ability to develop and implement new features on schedule
  * Product development experience
  * Experience architecting and scaling 

What You Will Be Doing  
Tech Breakdown  

  * 90% PHP/ Laravel
  * 10% Front End (mainly connecting APIs)

  
Daily Responsibilities  

  * 80% Hands On
  * 5% Management Duties
  * 15% Team Collaboration

The Offer

  * End of year bonus based on performance metrics

  
You will receive the following benefits:  

  * Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
  * Vacation Time
  * Stock Options
  * Additional week of at the end of the year
  * Remote work across Ontario
  * Home Office Stipend

  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the Canada on a full-time
basis now and in the future.
Description.19:
## Job Description

**Who we are**

BairesDev is proud to be the fastest-growing company in America. With people
in five continents and world-class clients, we are only as strong as the
multicultural teams at the heart of our business. To consistently deliver the
highest quality solutions to our clients, we only hire the Top 1% of the best
talents and nurture their professional growth on exciting projects.

Sales Coordinator at BairesDev

We are looking for a Sales Coordinator to join our Sales Team and help
spearhead our growth.

As a Sales Coordinator, you will play a critical and active role in the day-
to-day operations. This is an excellent opportunity to be one of the key
members of our Sales team and position yourself for unique career growth
opportunities.

 **What You'll Do:**

  * Conduct in-depth research on prospects.
  * Using proprietary Sales Tools to contact and convert leads into clients.
  * Contacting potential clients via email to establish rapport and set up meetings.
  * Reach out by phone and hold quality conversations to generate qualified prospects.
  * Work closely and collaboratively to develop and implement appropriate prospect strategies and plans.
  * Work internally with the Sales Management and Marketing teams to ensure proper quality and quantity of presentations.
  * Provide complete and appropriate solutions to boost revenue growth and profitability.
  * Present, promote, and sell services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers.
  * Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.

 **Here s what we are looking for:**

  * Proven work experience as a Sales Representative.
  * Must be highly motivated, flexible, and service-oriented.
  * Must be familiar with CRM practices, along with the ability to build productive business professional relationships.
  * Goal-oriented, driven, and experienced in networking with and influencing decision-makers.
  * Excellent selling, communication, and negotiation skills.
  * Prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills.
  * Thorough understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques.
  * Experience in opening doors to new opportunities.
  * Fast learner and passionate about sales.
  * A network of potential clients in the IT industry or other verticals is a big plus.
  * Advanced English level.

 **How we do make your work (and your life) easier:**

  * 100% remote work.
  * Hardware setup for you to work from home.
  * Flexible hours make your schedule.
  * Paid parental leave, vacation & holidays.
  * Diverse and multicultural work environment.
  * An innovative environment with the structure and resources of a leading multinational.
  * Excellent compensation well above the market average.
  * Here you can grow at the speed of your learning curve.

Our people work remotely but with a consistent and robust culture that
promotes diversity and teamwork. To continue being the leading software
development company in Latin America, we want to ensure that every BairesDev
member gets the best growth and professional development opportunities in a
diverse, welcoming, and innovative environment.

Every BairesDev team member brings something unique to our company.

We want to hear your story. Apply now!

Check our website.
